title: Taboo
description: September 2015 - After being out of print for over 1-year, Taboo (2nd edition) is set to return to Amazon.com.Goodread members may download the full e-book of the 1st edition for free from the Goodreads site.Taboo is a compilation of 365 (English) Haiku’s poems; many of which break or bend traditional rules for producing Haiku poetry.This rule-breaking author has provided numerous examples in his book that will entertain, amuse, and delight the reader to varying degrees. The book is divided into four ‘seasons’ of Love, Passion, Pain, and Sensuality to captivate readers and let them journey into an unravelling world of erotic lovemaking.
author: P.J. Bayliss
